jobDescription: Malin is looking for a Data Reporting Analyst to assist our Information Systems department in compiling, interpreting and reconciling key business, financial, operational and statistical data. This vital information will be used by leadership, and internal and external customers to look at certain business trends to prioritize business and information needs.  The successful candidate will have: 2-4 years in a similar role as a Data AnalystAdvanced level -- SSRS and ExcelIntermediate level -- SQL writingSSAS and SSIS knowledge preferredPower BI experience preferredStrong analytical, research and problem solving skillsStrong written and verbal skillsAbility to work independently, as well as a strong team environmentAbility to effectively manage timeAbility to project high degree of self-confidence and a positive attitudeMalin is an Equal Opportunity Employer -- M/F/Veteran/Disability/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity
